public function DataManager()

dataRouter

public function dataRouter(d: MouseEvent = undefined):void

Data router to do a bunch of stuff.  I suspect most of this should be refactored into GUI.as as it almost entirely pertains to display state vis-a-vis the display state of the data manager.

private function loadBaseData(obj: Object,
curGameObj: Object):Boolean

verifyBlob

private function verifyBlob(data: Object):Boolean

Verify that ALL of the properties we expect to be present on a save data element, for this version of a save, are present and sane.  This works during both save AND load for the “simple” data.  Probably extend it into complex types later

Parameters

param data Data blob to verify

Returns

Boolean true/false of verification
